summary.span: 代表資料庫的連接。

When you inherit from , you must override the following members: , , , , , and . You must also provide the following properties: , , , , and .

summary.span: 開始資料庫交易。

span.span: Starts a database transaction.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要建立您自己的連線類型，會覆寫這個方法以實作開始交易的所需程式碼。If you are creating your own connection type, override this method to implement the code necessary to begin a transaction.

summary.span: 開始資料庫交易。

Public MustOverride Sub ChangeDatabase (databaseName As String)

param.name: databaseName
param.span: 指定連接所要使用的資料庫名稱。

span.span: Specifies the name of the database for the connection to use.

summary.span: 為開啟的連接變更目前的資料庫。

span.span: Changes the current database for an open connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中提供的值`databaseName`參數必須是有效的資料庫名稱目前執行個體。The value supplied in the `databaseName` parameter must be a valid database name for the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉與資料庫的連接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the database.

summary.span: 這是關閉任何開啟連接的慣用方法。

span.span: This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會回復任何暫止交易。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然後，它會釋放連接集區中，連接或關閉連接，如果連接共用已停用。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. 應用程式可以呼叫一次以上。An application can call more than one time. 會不產生任何例外狀況。No exception is generated. 如果移出的範圍，它不封閉。If the goes out of scope, it is not closed. 因此，您必須明確地關閉此連接呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`，這是相同的功能。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`, which are functionally equivalent. 如果連接共用值`Pooling`設`true`或`yes`，這也會釋放實體連接。If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, this also releases the physical connection. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`上**連接**、 **DataReader**，或在任何其他 managed 的物件`Finalize`類別的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a **Connection**, a **DataReader**, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在完成項中，您應該只需釋放類別直接擁有的 unmanaged 的資源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果類別未擁有任何 Unmanaged 資源，請不要在類別定義中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md).

exception.span: 開啟連接時發生的連接層級錯誤。

span.span: The connection-level error that occurred while opening the connection.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string ConnectionString { get; set; }
Public MustOverride Property ConnectionString As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ ConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來開啟連接的字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used to open the connection.

value.span: 用來建立初始連接的連接字串。

span.span: The connection string used to establish the initial connection.

value.span: 連接字串的確切內容取決於這個連接的特定資料來源。

span.span: The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection.
The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接字串的確切內容取決於這個連接的特定資料來源。The exact contents of the connection string depend on the specific data source for this connection. 若要判斷有效的設定，請參閱您使用的連接的特定類型的文件。To determine which settings are valid, see the documentation for the specific type of connection that you are using.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ConnectionTimeout As Integer
public: virtual property int ConnectionTimeout { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得在終止嘗試並產生錯誤前建立連接的等待時間。

span.span: Gets the time to wait while establishing a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

value.span: 等待連接開啟的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.

value.span: 預設值是由您使用的連接特定型別所決定。

span.span: The default value is determined by the specific type of connection that you are using.

span.span: Creates and returns a object associated with the current connection.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要實作自己的連接，覆寫這個方法以實作來建立並傳回所需程式碼物件。If you are implementing your own connection, override this method to implement the code necessary to create and return a object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Database As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Database { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得連接開啟後的目前資料庫名稱，或連接開啟前連接字串中所指定的資料庫名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the current database after a connection is opened, or the database name specified in the connection string before the connection is opened.

value.span: 目前資料庫的名稱或連接開啟後要使用之資料庫的名稱。

span.span: The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened.
The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接通常會以動態方式更新這個屬性目前的資料庫變更時。A connection typically updates this property dynamically when the current database changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DataSource As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ DataSource { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得要連接的資料庫伺服器名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the database server to which to connect.

value.span: 要連接的資料庫伺服器名稱。

span.span: The name of the database server to which to connect.
The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料庫的連接已關閉，傳回任何包含於如`DataSource`關鍵字。If the connection to the database is closed, the returns whatever is contained in the for the `DataSource` keyword. 如果連接為開啟和資料來源關鍵字的值開頭"|`datadirectory`|"，屬性會傳回任何包含在的`DataSource`只關鍵字。If the connection is open and the data source keyword's value starts with "|`datadirectory`|", the property returns whatever is contained in the for the `DataSource` keyword only. 如果資料庫的連接已開啟，屬性會傳回原生提供者傳回的`DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE`，空的若是原生提供者的`DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME`傳回。If the connection to the database is open, the property returns what the native provider returns for the `DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE`, and if that is empty, the native provider's `DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME` is returned.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnlistTransaction(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction) cil managed

param.name: transaction
param.span: 要登記之現有 的參考。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 登記指定的交易。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的 ADO.NET 2.0 是支援的使用`EnlistTransaction`編列到分散式交易中的方法。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the `EnlistTransaction` method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因為它在登錄中的連接執行個體，`EnlistTransaction`利用中的可用功能命名空間來管理分散式交易。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, `EnlistTransaction` takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions. 在交易中明確地登記連接之後, 無法取消登錄或另一個交易中登記，直到第一筆交易完成為止。Once a connection is explicitly enlisted in a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes.

summary.span: 傳回這個 之資料來源的結構描述資訊。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果連接與交易相關聯，執行`GetSchema`呼叫可能會造成某些提供者擲回例外狀況。If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Data.DataTable GetSchema (string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetSchema (collectionName As String, restrictionValues As String()) As DataTable
public: virtual System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchema(System::String ^ collectionName, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ restrictionValues);

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要傳回之結構描述的名稱。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

param.name: restrictionValues
param.span: 指定所要求之結構描述的限制值集合。

span.span: Specifies a set of restriction values for the requested schema.

summary.span: 使用結構描述名稱的特定字串和限制值的特定字串陣列，傳回這個 之資料來源的結構描述資訊。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `restrictionValues`參數可以提供*n*深度的限制集合的特定集合所指定的值。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values, which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 若要設定特定的限制，值及設定的其他限制的值，您需要將上述限制設為 null，然後放入您想要指定的值限制中的適當值。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. 這個範例是"Tables"集合。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果"Tables"集合有三個的限制 （資料庫、 擁有者和資料表名稱），而且您想要取回只有擁有者 「 卡爾"相關聯的資料表，您必須傳遞下列值至少： null、"Carl"。If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions (database, owner, and table name) and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", you must pass in the following values at least: null, "Carl". 如果未傳入限制值，預設值會使用該限制。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 這是相同的對應與傳入 null，不同於傳遞的參數值為空字串。This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在此情況下，則為空字串 ("") 會被視為指定參數的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. 如果連接與交易相關聯，執行`GetSchema`呼叫可能會造成某些提供者擲回例外狀況。If the connection is associated with a transaction, executing `GetSchema` calls may cause some providers to throw an exception.

span.span: is specified as null.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需概觀，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For an overview, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Open() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 所指定的設定，開啟資料庫連接。

span.span: Opens a database connection with the settings specified by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者定義的行為必須覆寫這個方法。This method must be overridden with user-defined behavior. 將會擲回例外狀況，如果呼叫一次而不先關閉。 will throw an exception if called again without first being closed.

span.span: An error occurred while opening the connection.

summary.span: 此方法會實作非同步版本的 。

span.span: This method implements an asynchronous version of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需在.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 的非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[進行非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task OpenAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 非同步版本的 ，這個版本會透過 所指定的設定開啟資料庫連接。

span.span: An asynchronous version of , which opens a database connection with the settings specified by the .

summary.span: 這個方法會叫用虛擬方法 與 CancellationToken.None。

span.span: This method invokes the virtual method with CancellationToken.None.

returns.span: 表示非同步作業的工作。

span.span: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呼叫，必須傳回直到傳回完成。After calling , must return until the returned is completed. 然後，如果連接成功，必須傳回。Then, if the connection was successful, must return . 如果連接失敗，必須傳回。If the connection fails, must return . 呼叫會嘗試取消，或關閉對應呼叫。A call to will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding call. 如需在.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 的非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[進行非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task OpenAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

span.span: The cancellation instruction.

summary.span: 這是 的非同步版本。

span.span: This is the asynchronous version of .

summary.span: 提供者應該覆寫為適當的實作。

span.span: Providers should override with an appropriate implementation.

summary.span: 可以選擇性地接受取消語彙基元。

span.span: The cancellation token can optionally be honored.

summary.span: 預設實作會叫用同步呼叫並傳回完成的工作。

span.span: The default implementation invokes the synchronous call and returns a completed task.

summary.span: 如果傳遞一個已經被取消的 cancellationToken，預設實作會傳回已取消的工作。

span.span: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellationToken.

summary.span: Open 擲回的例外狀況會透過傳回的工作例外狀況屬性來傳送。

span.span: Exceptions thrown by Open will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.

summary.span: 在傳回的工作完成之前，不叫用 物件的其他方法及屬性。

span.span: Do not invoke other methods and properties of the object until the returned Task is complete.

returns.span: 表示非同步作業的工作。

span.span: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呼叫，必須傳回直到傳回完成。After calling , must return until the returned is completed. 然後，如果連接成功，必須傳回。Then, if the connection was successful, must return . 如果連接失敗，必須傳回。If the connection fails, must return . 呼叫會嘗試取消，或關閉對應呼叫。A call to will attempt to cancel or close the corresponding call. 如需在.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 的非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[進行非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming in the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
